problem_text_cn: 如图是一顶圆锥形烟囱小纸帽,它的母线长l是13cm,高h为12cm,则制作这顶纸帽所需纸张的面积是(接缝忽略不计)()
problem_text_en: The picture shows a small paper cap with a conical chimney. The length of its generatrix l is N_0 and its height h is N_1. The area of ​​paper required to make this paper cap is (the seams are ignored) ()
raw_answer: 解:∵圆锥的母线长l是13cm,高h为12cm,∴圆锥的底面半径为r=√{13^{2}-12^{2}}=5cm,∴这张扇形纸板的面积=\frac{1}{2}×2π×5×13=65π(cm^{2})．故选:B．
